item.how_to_find_us: New Washington Street is as short street, and the google map shows "0" at the wrong end. The off leash area is at the end closest to the Holiday Inn / Inner Belt Road. If you run into trouble, ask anyone where the "dog park" is. :)

group.name: The Boston Area Wheaten Terrier Meetup Group
